@sarahlustberg @AirCanada Hi Sarah, please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/99riI0OUuT. Be sure to include any receipts from additional expenses.
Best regards, Alessandra

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text:
@mama_danielle83 @AirCanada @yulaeroport Dear Danielle,
Sorry to hear about the experience you had with us on your last flights with us. I can only apologize from my side that we left you disappointed. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/62YZ6n224l

data.text: @CarlHPetersonIV Hi Carl, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@PhutureTrax1 Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@robertrotifer Hi Robert, we're sincerely sorry that you're affected by a flight cancellation and the inconveniences caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can arrange the ticket refund. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@FeinigJakob Hallo Jakob, es tut mir sehr leid, dass du von einer Stornierung betroffen bist. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und wir schauen dir gerne nach. Kind regards, Daphne

@MilanGanatra1 Hi Milan, we are sorry to hear that you have been affected by a cancellation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. We can offer you an alternative connection departing at 12.45 via Vienna. Arriving in Dubrovnik at 16.45 Please confirm this change. Kind regards, Chris
@interim_dan a report yet, please fill out the form here: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @interim_dan Hi Danny, I'm sorry that you haven't received your luggage. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report as we, the Social Media Team, have no access to any claims submitted by you. If you don't have [1/2]
@DustyBeers Hi Dustin, If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com. https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

@Samyy91 Hi Samy, I'm sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. If there's anything we can assist you with please send us your booking code in a DM. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@patto97645555 Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you have not been rebooked in the meantime, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@BernardDugdale Hi Bernard, how can we assist you? Kind regards, Chris
@NicoBurra Hi Nico, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@everaldoneto Hi Everaldo, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Verspätung betroffen warst und wir entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. Können wir dir noch irgendwie weiterhelfen? Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@hyggelig Hi Basak, we are sorry to hear that you have been affected by a delay and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@AndrasSule Hi Andras, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@LukasPeric1 Dear Lukas,
Unforeseen circumstances such as a delay, gate change or a flight cancellation can happen. Check your flight status and current flight information here:
https://t.co/abAkq0TcxN
Best regards.
Alessandra

urls.title: Flight Status & Itinerary
urls.description: We aim to inform you promptly about any unforeseen changes, such as a delay. Check your flight status and current flight information.

data.text: @Enjay_in_V Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass es während deiner Reise zu diesen Unannehmlichkeiten gekommen ist. Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem PIR zu finden ist. Den Property Irregularity Report hast du am Lost&Found Schalter bekommen. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay
@wilsonleiteneto Hi Wilson, we are sorry to hear you had no success reaching out to our colleagues by phone. Please send them an email at viellos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

@leahjanerose Hi, please use our online tracking: https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 Once your luggage has arrived our colleagues will contact you. Unfortunately, this is currently taking longer than usual. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@risehigher86 @EASA [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@risehigher86 @EASA [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@claudiastevens8 [2/2] If you need to buy items in the meantime please keep the receipts and submit them online: https://t.co/Yv644ofc3b Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @claudiastevens8 [1/2] Hi Claudia, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Our colleagues are doing their best to work through each case and will contact you once your luggage can be delivered.
@e_parso Hi Emma, I'm sorry that you're having trouble contacting us. Please send us your booking code and concern via PM and we'll have a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@DustyBeers Hi Dustin,  I'm sorry for the long waiting time on the phone. Unfortunately, we are experiencing an increased number of calls at the moment. Please try again at a later time. Kind regards, Derya
@wilsonleiteneto [2/2] Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@wilsonleiteneto [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger

@K_EarthProjects @mechnight24 @BurstonThomas [2/2]  However, please refer to the contacts on your missing luggage report or send an email to viellos@austrian.com. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya
@K_EarthProjects @mechnight24 @BurstonThomas [1/2]Hi Kath, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.
@GlernterOe Hi, Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/M3WLkUPn4R Freundliche Grüße, Chris

data.text: @joinsimon Hi Simon, we are sorry to hear that you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@DustyBeers Hi Dustin, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@alex_biet Hi Alex, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@AngeloMoretti3 Hi Angelo, I'm sorry that you cannot fly as planned. Please send your booking code via DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@winewinecode Hi there, I'm sorry you could not fly as planned. Please send us your booking code, so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@twitjawy Hi, unfortunately baggage tracing is taking a lot longer than normal. If you have already filed a missing bag report you will be contacted once it has been located. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@SariArhoHavren [2/2] However, we can only ask you once again to contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, D

@SariArhoHavren [1/2]Hi Sari, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the enormous amount of requests, there can, unfortunately, be longer waiting times.
@itskatetemp Hi, we have sent you a PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Clara_Yalmanian Hi, we replied to your PM. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@BurstonThomas Hi Thomas, I totally understand you. Believe me, everybody is aware of the situation. Well, if you want, you can just go to the Vienna airport and contact our colleagues directly and pick up your bag, if you are 100 % sure that there. Kind regards, Derya
@ByNatalieFit Hi Natz, we apologize one more time for any inconvenience caused. To file your complaint please use the following link: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @MichaelaKalcher Hi Michaela, please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. Kind regards
@VentiMochaTRex [1/2]Hi there, we regret to hear that the baggage of the group was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.
@mona_safey Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM and the requested dates and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah

@CarlHPetersonIV [2/2] Austrian Airlines is taking over responsibility for the delay of the baggage according to international regulations which say that 50% of the costs you had to spend on clothes and 100% of costs you had to spend on cosmetics and underwear will be reimbursed. Kind regards, D
@CarlHPetersonIV [1/2]Hi Carl, I am sorry that your luggage did not arrive together with your flight to Florence. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconveniences this may have caused you.
@Adenjo Hi Mouth, we're sorry that you are affected by a flight canellation. Please send us your booking code in a PM, so we can have a close look. Kind regards, Sarah

@joypad23 Hi Martin, we are sincerely sorry that you were affected by a flight cancelation. Is there still something we can help you with your booking? If so please send us a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@mgechev Hi Minko, we're so sorry for that. According to your reservation, you're currently booked on tonight's flight OS 799, which actually is delayed to 10 p.m. Best regards, Christiane

@c_kronenberg Lieber Christopher, es tut uns wirklich leid, dass aktuell unsere Leitungen so sehr überlastet sind. Deine Kosten sowie die Entschädigung kannst du über folgendes Formular: https://t.co/Eh80wXhsDt geltend machen. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

data.text: @BicaDzeljana Hi, unfortunately, all our channels are very busy so getting back to you takes time. We're working on every inquiry one by one and will get back to you asap. If there's anything we can assist you with please be specific and send us your booking reference in a DM. BR, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@PhilippJauernik Hallo Philipp, es tut uns sehr leid, dass die Wartezeiten aktuell so lange sind. Bitte schick uns doch deinen Buchungscode und dein Anliegen in eine DM, gerne versuchen wir dir hier weiterzuhelfen. Liebe Grüße, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@HusinaliAli @berlinairport Hi Husin, we are really sorry that you are affected by a flight irregularity. Do you still need assistance? If yes, please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @lowrentscumbag [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@lowrentscumbag [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport.  There you find all information about your case. The contact there will be glad to assist you.
